Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8554 affecting package python-kubernetes for versions less than 21.7.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-8554 affecting package python-kubernetes for versions less than 21.7.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-kubernetes is earlier than 21.7.0-1, affected by CVE-2020-8554
